title: Defying Gravity
description: A hockey star. His hidden boyfriend. And his fake girlfriend. What could go wrong?Tyler Wolfe has it all, or does he? He’s living his dream, playing pro hockey. Everything would be perfect if he didn’t have to hide the most important thing in his life.Danny Fisher has had enough. Two years as Tyler's hidden boyfriend have taken a toll on him and he considers leaving Tyler.Lily Parker is struggling with her career. Training young horses isn’t an easy job—one where she has recently been lying in the dirt more than being on the horse. An evening meant to leave her problems behind her leads to a chance encounter with Danny and Tyler, complicating her life even more.Defying Gravity is part of the Tigers Hockey Romance series and can be read as a standalone.Pick up Defying Gravity to discover this exciting new series today!
author: Isabella Cassazza
